feature.label: m2e dynamic source code lookup
feature.description: Allows Eclipse Java debugger lookup sources of Java classes dynamically loaded by Maven JVM, such as Maven plugins. Supports multiple versions of the same class loaded by the Maven VM. Sources are looked up among Eclipse workspace projects or resolved from Maven repositories as necessary.
